snippet: Weaving together the stories of two men, at the James Gallery.
abstract: Martha Schwendener reviews exhibit A World Redrawn: Eisenstein and Brecht in Hollywood, showcasing films and artwork by Zoe Beloff, at The James Gallery at the City University of New York.
lead_paragraph: Weaving together the stories of two men, at the James Gallery.

headline.print_headline: Zoe Beloff Delves Into Eisenstein and Brecht
headline.main: Zoe Beloff Delves Into Eisenstein and Brecht
